meanings.definition: The act of engraving or carving a design into a surface.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed intaglioing intricate patterns on metal.
meanings.sent2: The artist's intaglioing on the woodblock was precise and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel intaglioed its initials on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her intaglioing of emotions into her artwork was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The intaglioing on the ancient stone tablet told a story of the past.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a print by pressing a plate with an incised design onto paper.
meanings.sent1: After intaglioing the plate, she carefully printed the design on paper.
meanings.sent2: The intaglioing of the plate resulted in a beautiful print.
meanings.sent3: The printer accidentally intaglioed the wrong image on the paper.
meanings.sent4: His intaglioing of dreams onto paper brought them to life.
meanings.sent5: The intaglioing process required precision and patience to achieve the desired outcome.

meanings.definition: The technique of creating a design by cutting into a material.
meanings.sent1: The sculptor's intaglioing of marble was a masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: Intaglioing intricate patterns on leather requires skill and practice.
meanings.sent3: She intaglioed a heart shape on the cake with frosting.
meanings.sent4: His intaglioing of ideas into the clay was innovative.
meanings.sent5: The intaglioing technique allowed for intricate designs to be created on various materials.
